text: @realDonaldTrump . The DO-NOTHING most corrupt prez in history trying to distract from allowing Russia to go unpunished for bounties on American soldiers & ignoring #COVID19 over 127THOUSAND deaths, along w/his MANY atrocities against humanity! Can’t wait 4 @IntlCrimCourt 2 come 4 him!
